<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 19"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Sky-Piercing Bow](/Equipment.aspx?ID=950)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Fists of the Ruby Phoenix</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 74</row>

**Price** 40,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Composite Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Large turquoise gems stud the outer edge of this sturdy _+3 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [ghost touch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) [composite shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75)_. Arrows shot from the bow are unimpaired by wind and air effects.

<document level="2" id="action-722" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
